#include<algorithm>
#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<vector>
#include<fstream>
#include<iomanip>
#include<bitset>
#include<deque>
#include<queue>
#include<string>
#include<map>
#include<cstring>
#include<sstream>
#include<cmath>
#include<ctime>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int T;
	scanf("%d", &T);
	for (int t = 0; t < T; t++)
	{
		int N;
		scanf("%d", &N);
		int r = N%6;
		if (r == 1 || r == 5)
			printf("NO\n");
		else
			printf("YES\n");
	}
	return 0;
}
